thread.title: Watch ODU football in Town Point Park
thread.title_full: Watch ODU football in Town Point Park

author: Jane Wertz
title: Watch ODU football in Town Point Park
text:
Posted on September 29, 2015 by Sarah Hill 
Don’t be too sad that the Old Dominion Monarchs are going to be in San Antonio on November 7. Norfolk Festevents is going to make sure you can still see the football game- on a BIG SCREEN! 
ODU fans can gather at Town Point Park on November 7th at 4 p.m. for picnics and “tailgating” in the park. The game starts at 7, and it’ll be broadcast live on a large outdoor screen. 
Bring your lawn chairs, blankets and picnics. DO NOT BRING: cars, grilling, tents, or your own alcohol. Food and drink will be available for purchase at the event, including beer and wine. 
If you really want to go big, Festevents is accepting reservations for a limited number of 20’ x 20’ VIP boxes for private entertaining throughout the event. Contact Domenick Fini for more details at finid@festevents.org. 
It’ll be happening rain or shine (in case of really bad inclement weather), and we hope to see you there!
